titles.title: A bill to amend the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to reauthorize the Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer with an amendment. With written report No. 112-46.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 126.

bill.summary: 3/10/2011--Reported to Senate amended. Amends the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to authorize appropriations to carry out such Act for FY2012-FY2017.
